name: MTLParallelRenderCommandEncoder
desc: An object that splits up a single render pass so that it can be simultaneously encoded from multiple threads.

items.name: func makeRenderCommandEncoder() -> MTLRenderCommandEncoder?
items.desc: Create an object that encodes commands that perform graphics rendering operations and may be assigned to a different thread.

items.name: func setColorStoreAction(MTLStoreAction, index: Int)
items.desc: Specifies a known store action to replace the initial MTLStoreAction.unknown value specified for a given color attachment.

items.name: func setColorStoreActionOptions(MTLStoreActionOptions, index: Int)
items.desc: Specifies known store action options for a given color attachment.

items.name: func setDepthStoreAction(MTLStoreAction)
items.desc: Specifies a known store action to replace the initial MTLStoreAction.unknown value specified for a given depth attachment.

items.name: func setDepthStoreActionOptions(MTLStoreActionOptions)
items.desc: Specifies known store action options for a given depth attachment.

items.name: func setStencilStoreAction(MTLStoreAction)
items.desc: Specifies a known store action to replace the initial MTLStoreAction.unknown value specified for a given stencil attachment.

items.name: func setStencilStoreActionOptions(MTLStoreActionOptions)
items.desc: Specifies known store action options for a given stencil attachment.
